New Records: Luka Modric became the oldest scorer in Euros history
Key Match Events: Luka Modrić scored the opening goal for Croatia in the second half
Mattia Zaccagni scored a last-minute equaliser for Italy
Post-Match Reflections: Italy will play Switzerland in the knockout stage on Saturday
Miscellaneous Highlights: Despite not many goals being scored, the game was quite intense
Others: Croatia have two points from their three games and must wait on other results to see if it’s enough to scrape through as one of the best third-place finishers
Spain confirmed their 100% win trend against Albania across all 9 official games played
Albania's defeat means elimination and last place in Group B
